business.headline: US markets open lower day after Trump declines to rule out recessionIt's not just stocks struggling. Investors are sending prices lower for all kinds of investments whose momentum had earlier seemed nearly impossible to stop at times, such as bitcoin.

Bitcoin slips despite Trump's Strategic Bitcoin Reserve announcement. Here's whyBitcoin, the world's largest cryptocurrency, has dropped by 2.04% since the last day and is currently trading at $83,200.67, at the time of writing this article.

Tesla shares dip 45% in 3 months: What's behind the decline?Tesla's market value has fallen 45% since reaching a record high of $1.5 trillion on December 17, 2024. The stock surge followed Musk's financial backing of Donald Trump's election victory.

Income Tax Department expands e-Pay tax service to 30 banks. Check latest listIndia's Income Tax Department offers the E-Pay Tax service on the e-Filing portal, enabling individuals, businesses, and entities in India to pay direct taxes like advance tax, self-assessment tax, and TDS/TCS digitally from their bank accounts.

Sensex, Nifty early gains to close lower amid global headwinds; HUL gains 2%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 217.41 points to close at 74,115.17, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 92.20 points to end at 22,460.30.

Large caps vs midcaps vs small caps: Where should you invest now?Markets witnessed a brief respite after closing their best week in 2025 last week. Broader markets, especially midcap and smallcap stocks, performed well. The BSE Midcap index gained 3%, while the BSE Smallcap index jumped 6% last week.
Need funds? Here's how to get a loan against mutual fundYou can apply online or visit the lender's branch by submitting a loan application form and providing details of your mutual fund holdings.

7th Pay Commission: DA hike announcement this week, likely before HoliOver 12 million central government employees and retirees are likely to benefit from the said hike under the 7th Pay Commission. With this possible revision, the DA would increase from 53% to 55% of the basic pay.

Defence boost from Europe? These 4 PSU stocks could see strong upsideAccording to ICICI Securities, defence companies that already have supply agreements, partnerships, or orders from European firms are likely to benefit the most. The brokerage firm has highlighted four companies that could gain from this.

Retail inflation likely fell below 4% in February: ReportAs fresh winter produce hit markets over the past few months, food items - which make up nearly half of the inflation basket - saw a sustained slowdown in price increases.

Is your startup looking for funding? Top 4 opportunities in IndiaOne of the biggest funding programmes available right now is the Startup Maha Rathi Challenge, which is part of Startup Mahakumbh 2025.

SRK wins tax dispute case: What is foreign tax credit and how to claim it? Khan had declared an income of Rs 83.42 crore in his tax return, but the tax officer reassessed it as Rs 84.17 crore and denied him foreign tax credit (FTC) for taxes paid in the UK.

entertainment.headline: Ashish Chanchlani makes public appearance after India's Got Latent row. WatchContent creator Ashish Chanchlani made a rare public appearance in Mumbai amid controversy surrounding Ranveer Allahbadia's comment on India's Got Latent.

Watch: Hip Hop India 2 trailer promises to raise intensity, higher the stakesHip Hop India, the country's hip-hop dance reality show, is set to return for its second season on Amazon MX Player, promising even more thrilling performances and intense dance battles.

You 5 trailer: Penn Badgeley's Joe Goldberg returns for a killer finaleThe trailer for You Season 5 is out, showcasing the last chapter of Joe Goldberg's saga. Streaming starts April 24 on Netflix, with Joe facing past demons.
South Korean singer Wheesung found dead at 43Popular South Korean soloist Wheesung was found dead at his home on Monday. The authorities are still investigating the matter.

Meghan Markle's father criticises her show, mocks her for putting flowers on food Meghan Markle's estranged father, Thomas Markle, talked about her Netflix show, 'With Love, Meghan', in an interview. He called her 'fake', and mentioned that she should have had a more relatable show for women who are not privileged like her.

Surreal and magical: Singer Lisa Mishra on sharing stage with Ed SheeranSinger Lisa Mishra performed the opening act for British singer Ed Sheeran during his concert in India earlier this year. Speaking exclusively to India Today Digital, the 31-year-old reflected on her experience of the same. Additionally, she opened up about working with Ananya Panday in Call Me Bae.

Badshah's weight-loss video stuns fans, internet thinks he looks like AP DhillonA recent video of Badshah has left fans stunned by his physical transformation. While promoting his new clothing brand, he showcased his new look, prompting fans to compare him to fellow Punjabi singer and rapper AP Dhillon.

When Life Gives You Tangerines review:  IU, Park Bo-gum's series is a must-watchReleased-Fri Mar 07, 2025In When Life Gives You Tangerines, IU and Park Bo-gum deliver mesmerising performances in a story that spans decades. Set against the backdrop of 1960s Jeju, this K-drama explores themes of love, endurance, and the quiet strength of women.

Actor Helly Shah on TV's future: We need to up our gameActor Helly Shah talks about her comedy debut, TV's regressive content, and her Bollywood aspirations. She also shares that she dreams of playing bold and tough roles.

Lollapalooza Day 2: Green Day, Louis Tomlinson, Aurora make thunderous India debutMumbai's Mahalaxmi Racecourse became the epicentre of music as Lollapalooza India 2025 wrapped up Day 2. From Green Day's electrifying debut to indie rock and soulful serenades, it was a night of musical magic.

Suits LA: Harvey Spector lands on the West Coast, throws some sass at Ted BlackIn the new promo of 'Suits LA', Harvey Spector is finally seen interacting with Ted Black. Actor Gabriel Macht will be joining the show for a three-episode arc.

Exclusive: How Shawn Mendes collaborated with Indian sitarist for Lolla India setSinger Shawn Mendes collaborated with sitarist Megha Rawoot for Day 1 for Lollapalooza India. In an exclusive interview with Megha Rawoot, she spoke about her performance.

Security sought for Rashmika Mandanna after MLA's 'teach her a lesson' remarkAn association seeking rights for natives of Karnataka's Coorg (Kodagu) region, Codava National Council, urged the state authorities to provide security for actor Rashmika Mandanna. According to the council, the actor was being unfairly targeted after Congress MLA Ravi Ganiga claimed she refused to attend a Kannada film industry event.

Shankar Mahadevan remembers 'guiding light' Zakir Hussain on birth anniversaryIt was legendary tabla maestro Zakir Hussain's 74th birth anniversary on Sunday. Marking the occasion, singer and composer Shankar Mahadevan honoured him with heartfelt birthday wishes on social media.

Lady Gaga recalls psychosis diagnosis and how she felt 'ashamed' to talk about itIn an interview, singer Lady Gaga discussed her personal struggles that kept her away from music. She shared insights into her mental health journey, being diagnosed with psychosis and the support from her partner, Michael Polansky.

The Last of Us 2 trailer: Pedro Pascal and Bella Ramsey promise thrilling returnThe first full trailer of The Last of Us Season 2 is here. Starring Pedro Pascal and Bella Ramsey in lead roles, the HBO Max series promises a bigger and better season.

Lollapalooza India Day 1: Shawn Mendes must return for a solo concert in IndiaThe first day of Lollapalooza India 2025 kicked off on a grand note with Canadian singer Shawn Mendes' electrifying performance. The show also witnessed performances by several Indian artists, like Jonita Gandhi and Divine among others.

Shawn Mendes honours Virat Kohli, wears Team India jersey at Mumbai show. WatchSinger Shawn Mendes impressed fans with his debut India performance on March 8 at the Lollapalooza Mumbai show. During the concert, the singer delighted fans by wearing Virat Kohli's Team India jersey.

Viral: Shawn Mendes sings Senorita on Mumbai street ahead of concertCanadian singer Shawn Mendes, who is currently in India, performed his hit song Senorita on a Mumbai street on Saturday, much to the delight of his fans.
Zahan Kapoor on legacy, Black Warrant, and carving his own path. Watch

Zahan Kapoor reflects on celebrityhood, Kapoor legacy and Black Warrant's successActor Zahan Kapoor opened up about his career, his latest Netflix show, Black Warrant, his famous cousins, and more, at the India Today Conclave 2025 held in New Delhi on Saturday.

Mindy Kaling reacts to criticism of Meghan Markle's With Love, MeghanActor and creator Mindy Kaling has finally reacted to the criticism of Meghan Markle's lifestyle series, With Love, Meghan. The show premiered on Netflix on March 4.

The Electric State review: Russo Brothers' dystopian film sparks and fizzles outReleased-Fri Mar 14, 2025The Netflix film, 'The Electric State' falls short of entertainment. The chemistry between Millie Bobbie Brown and Chris Pratt looks awkward, while the bots don't do enough to keep the excitement alive.

Nadaaniyan X reviews: Internet shreds Ibrahim-Khushi's film, calls it trashyNadaaniyan, starring Ibrahim Ali Khan and Khushi Kapoor, debuts on Netflix to widespread criticism, with viewers and critics alike branding it 'unbearable' and 'trashy'.

Ruby review: A debut album that's ambitious, polished, and unapologetically Jennie Blackpink's Jennie's debut solo album, Ruby, is a bold exploration of her musical identity, featuring 15 tracks that delve into themes of empowerment and self-discovery.

Meghan Markle's With Love, Meghan renewed for season 2 amid criticismThe Duchess of Sussex, Meghan Markle, has announced a second season of her Netflix series, With Love, Meghan. The show premiered on the OTT giant on March 4.

BB OTT 3 fame Kritika-Armaan Malik's son Zaid diagnosed with ricketsBigg Boss OTT 3 fame Kritika Malik and husband Armaan Malik's son, Zaid has been diagnosed with rickets. The news was shared by Armaan's first wife, Payal Malik, in her latest vlog.

Neena Gupta's 'Phulera Ka Panchayati Raj' exposes proxy politics in rural IndiaTVF's new series 'Phulera Ka Panchayati Raj' exposed the problem of proxy politics in rural India. In collaboration with the popular series, Panchayat, the series starring Neena Gupta, Faisal Malik, and others is currently trending at No 1 on YouTube.

Pritam defends Blackpink's Jennie amid plagiarism row: Minor similarities happenMusic composer Pritam recently shared a statement and defended Blackpink's Jennie amid plagiarism claims after her recently released teaser looked similar to Alia Bhatt's theme song from Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani.

Mobland trailer: Tom Hardy, Pierce Brosnan headline Guy Ritchie's new crime showMobland, the much-awaited crime series by Guy Ritchie, is all set for its grand premiere on JioHotstar this March. Featuring stars like Tom Hardy and Helen Mirren, the show explores the dark world of international crime syndicates.

Rishab Sharma on popularising Sitar, starting his own clothing brandRenowned 26-year-old sitar player Rishab Rikhiram Sharma blends classical and modern music. Trained under Ravi Shankar, he performs globally, including at the White House. Known for his mehendi-adorned hands, he also creates music for mental health.

What Rick Hoffman's entry as Louis Litt means for Suits LAActor Rick Hoffman will be reprising his iconic character, Louis Litt, from 'Suits', in one of the upcoming episodes of 'Suits LA'. The news comes days after the show received bad reviews for lacking excitement like the original one.

Why sitarist Rishab Sharma wears mehndi for every performanceSitarist Rishab Sharma embraces mehndi as part of his stage presence, blending tradition with innovation. The young sitarist shares how he enhances performance aesthetics while breaking stereotypes.

Sitarist Rishab Sharma: Said no to performing at White House initiallyRenowned sitarist and internet sensation Rishab Sharma opened up about performing at the White House, choosing the sitar over guitar, and more, during his appearance at India Today Conclave 2025 in New Delhi on Friday.

Shabana Azmi says Shibani Akhtar 'pulled her by the ear' to join Dabba CartelShabana Azmi revealed at the India Today Conclave 2025 that Shibani Akhtar "pulled her by the ear" to make her join Dabba Cartel. Shibani always envisioned her as part of the series.

Shabana Azmi on Dabba Cartel, rise of OTT, and feminism in cinema. VideoAt the India Today Conclave 2025, Shabana Azmi spoke about her role in Dabba Cartel, emphasising that 'power can be quiet'. Co-creator Shibani Akhtar revealed that the concept was built around the idea of a "Shabana Azmi drug cartel" from the outset. The series presents a compelling narrative of women coming together in solidarity within a crime drama, with Azmi's nuanced and quiet yet powerful performance serving as its anchor. Her portrayal marks a significant thematic shift in Indian storytelling. Jyotika also shared her experience and connection to her character, highlighting how the roles reflect real-life struggles faced by women, as well as themes of feminism and women's emancipation.

Jyotika on working with Shabana Azmi in Dabba Cartel: She was a friend to usActor Jyotika was recently seen in the newly-released show Dabba Cartel. At India Today Conclave 2025, she spoke about her character in the crime drama, her camaraderie with Shabana Azmi and what drew her to Dabba Cartel.

Shabana Azmi, Jyotika and Shibani Dandekar open up about making Dabba Cartel. PicsDabba Cartel actors Shabana Azmi, Jyotika and creator Shibani Dandekar graced the India Today Conclave 2025 on Friday, where they shared their experience of creating the Netflix series.

BTS J-hope's Sweet Dreams is a sensuous song brought alive by Miguel's vocalsBTS member J-hope has released a new song called Sweet Dreams, which also features the American artiste Miguel. Check out the music video inside.

Dupahiya review: A wholesome watch for your next relaxed weekendReleased-Fri Mar 07, 2025Dupahiya review: This Prime Video series is a charming small-town comedy with endearing performances, witty dialogues, and social themes. While it drags at times, its humour and heart make it a delightful, easy watch.

general news.headline: X is down once again, massive global outage for third time in a dayMicroblogging platform X, formerly known as Twitter, is facing a massive worldwide outage for the third time today, with thousands of users reporting issues.

Investigation: How social media vultures feed on misery of sick childrenThey emotionally exploit people using photos of children in critical condition. Posing as saviours, they collect donations for treatment. And then they pocket the money.

Flushed polythene bags, clothes blocked plumbing: Air India on plane toilet messAir India confirmed that its flight en route to Delhi was forced to return to the US's Chicago after their investigation team found out that polythene bags, rags, and clothes were flushed down the toilet, causing the toilets "to become unserviceable."

US markets open lower day after Trump declines to rule out recessionIt's not just stocks struggling. Investors are sending prices lower for all kinds of investments whose momentum had earlier seemed nearly impossible to stop at times, such as bitcoin.

Anxious about bumping into your ex? Here's how to deal with it, maturelyIt could be at a mutual friend's wedding or an unexpected run-in at a shopping mall - life has a way of surprising you with an ex when you least expect it. But remember, you can deal with the situation maturely.

Truly heavenly: Lalit Modi's Vanuatu post as country moves to cancel his passportAmid the raging row over his newly-acquired Vanuatu passport, former IPL boss Lalit Modi reached the island nation and urged people to come visit it.

Ranya Rao alleges harassment in DRI custody: Wasn't hit but was verbally abusedKannada actor Ranya Rao, during her hearing, accused the DRI officials of verbally abusing her during interrogation. Rao was sent to DRI custody for three days by a Special Court, with the stipulation she be produced in court again on March 10.

Why Yogi Adityanath backs Sambhal cop in Holi-Friday namaz rowThe Uttar Pradesh CM, speaking at the India Today Conclave 2025, underlined the segregated Holi-Friday prayers plan for the district. On DSP Anuj Kumar Chaudhary, he said…

Dhanashree Verma's cryptic post after Yuzvendra Chahal, RJ Mahvash seen togetherIndia spinner Yuzvendra Chahal went viral on social media after he was seen with internet personality RJ Mahvash during the Champions Trophy Final. A day after the final, Dhanashree Verma posted an cryptic story on her Instagram profile.

Video: Stone thrown at ED vehicle leaving Bhupesh Baghel's home in ChhattisgarhA video whose authenticity could not be verified by India Today TV shows a stone being thrown at a car in which ED officials were travelling as it was leaving former Chhattisgarh Chief Minister Bhupesh Baghel's residence in Durg.

Designers apologise for Gulmarg show: Deeply regret hurt caused during RamzanDesigners Shivan and Narresh, who organised the outdoor fashion show in Jammu and Kashmir's Gulmarg during the holy month of Ramzan, which drew a massive controversy, have apologised for hosting the event.

Retirement not on mind, but Rohit Sharma uncertain about 2027 ODI World Cup goalIndia captain Rohit Sharma remained unclear about playing till the ODI World Cup 2027 following India's win in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. India beat New Zealand by four wickets as Rohit scored a match-winning innings of 76 (83).

Why Nepal is seeing a churn for Hindu monarchyThousands of people welcomed former king Gyanendra to Kathmandu amid a rise in calls to reinstate Hindu monarchy in Nepal. The Himalayan kingdom is seeing bike rallies and surge in online posts seeking a return to monarchy. This is what is fuelling these calls in Nepal, which was the last Hindu kingdom till 2008, when it became a secular republic.

Why are US and Ukraine holding talks on ending war with Russia in Saudi Arabia?After a tense Trump-Zelenskyy clash in February, the US and Ukraine will hold talks in Saudi Arabia to discuss ending the war with Russia. What makes Jeddah the chosen venue?

Maharashtra's move for Hindu-only mutton shops with 'Malhar' certificationAnnouncing the initiative, the Maharashtra fisheries minister Nitesh Rane urged Hindus to not buy mutton from shops which don't have Malhar certification.

83% of USAID programmes cancelled after six-week review: Top Trump officialIn a tweet, Secretary of State Marco Rubio said the 5,200 cancelled contracts spent tens of billions of dollars "in ways that did not serve/harmed the core interests of the US".

Caught on CCTV: Staff held at gunpoint, Rs 25 crore robbery at Tanishq showroomA group of men carried out a daylight robbery at a Tanishq showroom in Bihar's Ara, holding the staff and customers at gunpoint and stealing jewellery worth Rs 25 crore. Two robbers were later injured in a police encounter.

There was no search warrant: Bhupesh Baghel calls ED raids 'BJP's vendetta'Former Chhattisgarh Chief Minister Bhupesh Baghel alleged that he was neither allowed to attend the Chhattisgarh Assembly nor use his phone. The Congress leader further claimed that he was not provided with an ECIR number.

Why Pakistan representatives were missing from Champions Trophy closing ceremonyThe reason why there were no Pakistan representatives at the Champions Trophy closing ceremony has been revealed as an ICC spokesperson spoke to India Today about the situation. The absence of PCB officials at the closing ceremony created a lot of backlash, with Shoaib Akhtar being one of the people voicing his displeasure.

Domestic flights from Navi Mumbai from April, third airport for Mumbai proposedMaharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar said that domestic flights will be operational from Navi Mumbai International Airport in April and proposed a third airport for Mumbai near Vadhvan port.

Pune school students create music with geometry box, bottle. Video has 30 million viewsA short video of the Pune school students' impromptu performance was shared on Instagram by Project Asmi and has garnered close to 30 million views so far.

Sangam water at Maha Kumbh was fit for bathing, government tells ParliamentIn response to a question from Samajwadi Party MP Anand Bhadauria and Congress MP K Sudhakaran, Environment Minister Bhupender Yadav said that the water in the Ganga at Triveni Sangam in Prayagraj was fit for bathing during the recently concluded Maha Kumbh.

Devendra Fadnavis backs calls for Aurangzeb's tomb removal with jab at CongressThis comes a week after Samajwadi Party's Abu Azmi sparked controversy by praising Mughal emperor Aurangzeb. He claimed that Aurangzeb had built temples and was not a cruel emperor.

Thaw in India-Canada ties soon? What Trudeau's successor Mark Carney saidMark Carney, a former Goldman Sachs executive, was on Sunday named Justin Trudeau's successor as the Prime Minister of Canada and leader of the ruling Liberal Party. Trudeau resigned in January, months after facing a stiff internal revolt with demands for him to step down.

George Clooney looks unrecognisable with brown hair ahead of Broadway debutHollywood actor George Clooney shed his signature silver locks and was seen with a new brown-haired look, which was captured during an outing with his wife Amaal. The transformation is for his Broadway debut, Good Night, And Good Luck, where he will play journalist Edward R Murrow.

Triptii Dimri's visit to Trimbakeshwar Jyotirlinga Temple is 'one for the soul'Triptii Dimri visited the Trimbakeshwar Jyotirlinga Temple in Nashik and shared pictures on Instagram. She called the visit 'one for the soul'.

'Harry Potter' and 'Doctor Who' actor Simon Fisher-Becker dies at 63British actor Simon Fisher-Becker, known for "Harry Potter" and "Doctor Who," has passed away at 63. His husband and manager shared emotional tributes, remembering him as a kind and talented artist.

Watch: SRK's lavish IIFA suite with family pics, red furniture, screams luxuryShah Rukh Khan's suite at IIFA 2025 in Jaipur has been capturing attention. With lavish and royal touches, it was designed by Shantanu Garg.

sports.headline: NBA Play-In Tournament 2025: How to Watch, Standings, Schedule, and MoreThe NBA Play-In tournament is set to start in Apri. The tournament is going to be crucial in determining the final two playoffs spots in both the Eastern and Western Conferences.

When Rohit Sharma got the trophy, emotions got the better of me: Sunil Gavaskar Legendary India cricketer Sunil Gavaskar has said that the emotions got the better of him when captain Rohit Sharma lifted the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. Gavaskar was seen dancing in jubilation as India beat New Zealand by four wickets to clinch their third Champions Trophy title.

Qinwen Zheng beats Lulu Sun in straight sets, advances to Round of 16China's Qinwen Zheng defeated New Zealand's Lulu Sun in straight sets to progress to the Round of 16. Zheng won the rematch of the clash from Wimbledon 2024.

Dhanashree Verma's cryptic post after Yuzvendra Chahal, RJ Mahvash seen togetherIndia spinner Yuzvendra Chahal went viral on social media after he was seen with internet personality RJ Mahvash during the Champions Trophy Final. A day after the final, Dhanashree Verma posted an cryptic story on her Instagram profile.

Ambati Rayudu trolls RCB despite Sanjay Bangar's warning during Champions Trophy finalFormer Chennai Super Kings (CSK) batter Ambati Rayudu trolled Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) fans while doing commentary during the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 final between India and New Zealand.

Axar Patel vs KL Rahul: Delhi Capitals set to take captaincy call soonDelhi Capitals are yet to announce their captain for the upcoming Indian Premier League season. Sources have told PTI that the franchise is considering between Axar Patel and KL Rahul.

Fans give Gautam Gambhir grand welcome in Delhi after Champions Trophy triumphIndia head coach Gautam Gambhir received a grand welcome at the Delhi airport on Monday, 10 March. Gambhir returned from the UAE after winning the Champions Trophy.

Naji Marshall joins Mavericks' elite club with 34-point nightNaji Marshall's career-best 34 points weren't enough as the injury-riddled Mavericks lost their fifth straight game. With 10 sidelined players, Dallas' struggles continue.

KL Rahul admits being tense in Champions Trophy final: I was shi*** myselfIndia batter KL Rahul said that he was tense during the final of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 against New Zealand. Rahul played a crucial innings of 34* (33) to help India chase down 252.

Jonty Rhodes vs Glenn Phillips: Proteas legend settles best fielder debateLegendary South African cricketer Jonty Rhodes has shared his thoughts on who is the best fielder in this generation, he or Glenn Phillips. Rhodes gladly agreed that Phillips is perhaps the greatest fielder of this generation.

Santner captain, no Sharma in Champions Trophy Team of the TournamentIndia captain Rohit Sharma was not picked in the team of the tournament for the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. A total of five Indians made it to the team captained by Mitchell Santner.

India beat New Zealand by four wickets as Rohit scored a match-winning innings of 76 (83).

Watch: Sunil Gavaskar's adorable dance after India lifts Champions Trophy 2025Legendary India cricketer Sunil Gavaskar was seen dancing following India's win in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. The Men in Blue beat New Zealand by six wickets to clinch the title.

If India played in Pakistan, they would still have won Champions Trophy: Wasim AkramLegendary pacer Wasim Akram feels that the current Indian team would have won the Champions Trophy even if they played all their matches in Pakistan. India claimed their third Champions Trophy title with a win over New Zealand in Dubai on March 9.

Watch: Shubman Gill dances with father after India's victory Champions Trophy: Shubman Gill celebrated India's win against New Zealand with his father, Lakhwinder Singh. Gill scored 31 runs in the final as India won by four wickets.

If challenges are tough, throw some punches: Hardik PandyaChampions Trophy 2025: Hardik Pandya scored 18 runs at a run-a-ball on Sunday as India won the title after beating New Zealand by four wickets at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.

Ban tobacco, alcohol ads: Director general of health services tells IPL chairmanThe Ministry of Health and Family Welfare has written to the IPL chairman and the BCCI asking for a strict ban on tobacco and alcohol advertising during the upcoming season of the IPL, which will begin on March 22.

Captain to captain: Suryakumar Yadav sends heartfelt message to Rohit SharmaIndia's T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav had a special message for Rohit Sharma after the Champions Trophy win on Sunday, March 9. Rohit led from the front to help India win the final by 4 wickets against New Zealand.

Rohit Sharma's X-rated message to critics: Virat Kohli and I are not retiringRohit Sharma had some choice words for his critics as he announced that he and Virat Kohli won't be retiring from ODIs just yet after India's Champions Trophy win on Sunday, March 9. India defeated New Zealand in Dubai to win their third Champions Trophy title.

Rohit Sharma's X-rated message to critics: Virat Kohli and I are not retiringRohit Sharma had some choice words for his critics as he announced that he and Virat Kohli won't be retiring from ODIs just yet after India's Champions Trophy win on Sunday, March 9. India defeated New Zealand in Dubai to win their third Champions Trophy title.

Why Pakistan representatives were missing from Champions Trophy closing ceremonyThe reason why there were no Pakistan representatives at the Champions Trophy closing ceremony has been revealed as an ICC spokesperson spoke to India Today about the situation. The absence of PCB officials at the closing ceremony created a lot of backlash, with Shoaib Akhtar being one of the people voicing his displeasure.

Learn art of overcoming obstacles: Gautam Gambhir stuns Sidhu with poemThe usually serious Gautam Gambhir decided to stun Navjot Singh Sidhu with a few lines from a poem after India's Champions Trophy win on Sunday, March 9. India defeated New Zealand to win the final.

New Zealand wanted to win Champions Trophy final for Matt Henry: Mitchell SantnerNew Zealand skipper Mitchell Santner said that the team was looking to win the Champions Trophy final against India for the injured Matt Henry. The pacer missed the summit clash due to an injury and was left in tears ahead of the game on Sunday.

Champions Trophy victory proves why Gambhir is right man for white-ball jobGautam Gambhir secured his first ICC title as the India head coach on Sunday, March 9. After his title win, Gambhir stayed away from the limelight, making sure that he did not take the focus away from the players who had played near flawless cricket to secure the trophy.

IND vs NZ: Rohit Sharma's approach puts fear in bowlers, says Mitchell SantnerNew Zealand captain Mitchell Santner praised Rohit Sharma for his performance in the final of the Champions Trophy 2025. Rohit's 76 set up the thrilling chase for India on Sunday, March 9 in Dubai against the Blackcaps.

New Zealand is a very clinical team, satisfying to beat them: Rohit Sharma Champions Trophy 2025: Indian captain Rohit Sharma said that New Zealand is a very clinical team, and it was satisfying to beat them in the final on Sunday at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.

'Silent hero' Shreyas Iyer was brilliant: Rohit Sharma credits India batterChampions Trophy 2025: Rohit Sharma praised Shreyas Iyer for showing consistency and helping India win the title with a four-wicket win over New Zealand in the final in Dubai on Sunday.

Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli surpass MS Dhoni: Champions Trophy triumph in numbersChampions Trophy final: India defeated New Zealand on Sunday in the final to become the most-successful team in the tournament's history. Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli won their fourth ICC title, eclipsing MS Dhoni.

Foretold, feared, fulfilled; but final should have been played in LahoreIndia's Champions Trophy win was like a war never fought but already won. With a team as relentless as Sparta's 300 and a batting lineup that rose like demons from every fallen wicket, this victory was never in doubt -- only a story waiting to be told.

Caution with aggression: Gavaskar praises Rohit Sharma after 76 in final Champions Trophy 2025: In an interview with India Today, Sunil Gavaskar heaped praise on Rohit Sharma for mixing caution with aggression and helping India beat New Zealand in the final on Sunday in Dubai.

Cribbers might crib: Gavaskar says India the best white-ball team on the planetChampions Trophy 2025: The legendary Sunil Gavaskar said that India is the best white-ball team on the planet, having played in the finals of the last three ICC limited-overs events.

Hardik Pandya delighted to bury the ghosts of 2017 after triumphIndia all-rounder Hardik Pandya said that he was delighted to bury the ghosts of the 2017 Champions Trophy final following India's win in the 2025 edition. India beat New Zealand by four wickets to win the Champions Trophy 2025.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
